WizardTD

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • WizardTD.Entity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Enemy, Fireball, Tile

    public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
    The abstract base class for all entities that have a sprite in the WizardTD.

        public void setSprite(processing.core.PImage sprite)

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet app)
        Draws the entity onscreen using its sprite, x position and y position.
        Parameters:
        app - The PApplet object responsible for rendering the game.
